about_the_game:
■“Escape from Hell” minigame
Marianne had been trapped in a sexual Hell until one day she managed to escape her prison after catching a jailer off guard.
However, as she travels through the dimly-lit, confusing hallways, many erotic traps stop her in her tracks.
Will Marianne be able to escape the labyrinth?

In this 3D dungeon-style minigame, you’ll advance through passageways while avoiding erotic traps that are laid within.
The main character moves forward automatically, and will trigger aggressive traps along the way.
You can click the bursts of light as they appear, and if your timing is good enough, you’ll be able to dodge the attacks.
You’ll have multiple options to pick from at times, so choose well and guide Marianne to safety.

If your evasion doesn’t come fast enough, or if you select the wrong choice, Marianne will fall victim to an erotic trap.
This will cause various status changes, and her lewdness points will increase.

During her escape, she is also chased down by pursuers.
She must quickly hide herself or risk being caught and ravished.

Will Marianne be able to evade the traps and safely make it out of Hell?

Status condition events: 12
Erotic events: 6


■Training methods
Three new training methods have been added.
“Living flame”
“Tentacle clothes”
“Rope binding”

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 18.
